title: ICT-Based Tsunami Disaster Risk Reduction Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geographical concepts and foundational knowledge of disaster prevention
context.additional_context: Education utilizing ICT tools to virtually experience real tsunami-affected areas, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the causes and propagation processes of tsunamis from a geographical perspective.
Learners can design tsunami evacuation routes using ICT-based experiential learning tools and apply them to real-world scenarios.
Learners can establish disaster response plans at individual and community levels based on risk assessment judgment skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
